name: The Crystal Killer
description:
You're some knight(?!) dude called the Crystal Killer who has interesting opinions on reality and society.

Length of game is ~5 Minutes long. No fighting or "gameplay," just dialogue.

Controls: Z/Space/Enter to advance text & interact with people/signs/doors/objects, Arrow Keys to move.


CREDITS:
A game made by Tufukins using Wolf RPG Editor

--Scenario--
Concept & script - Tufukins

--Art--
Character design, sprite, & end card of the Crystal Killer - Tufukins
Map & NPC sprites are default Wolf RPG Editor sprites
